thread.title: Adam Levine, Maroon 5 reportedly in talks for Super Bowl 50 halftime show
thread.title_full: Adam Levine, Maroon 5 reportedly in talks for Super Bowl 50 halftime show

title: Adam Levine, Maroon 5 reportedly in talks for Super Bowl 50 halftime show
text:
Adam Levine, Maroon 5 reportedly in talks for Super Bowl 50 halftime show Resize Text By Cindy Boren October 25 at 11:24 AM Follow @cindyboren Adam Levine and Maroon 5 might just be providing halftime entertainment at Super Bowl 50. (Christopher Polk/Getty Images for CBS Radio Inc.) 
Adam Levine and Maroon 5 might just headline Super Bowl L , er, 50, next February. 
Levine and the band are in talks to star in what may be a halftime-a-palooza for the game’s golden anniversary at Levi’s Stadium in Santa Clara, E! News reports . Bruno Mars, who performed at Super Bowl XLVIII, has been invited back to curate a performance that would feature a number of acts, Billboard reports . Other headliners the NFL has discussed, E! says, include Coldplay and Mars. 
Katy Perry was the halftime act last February. After spending most of her career in traditional print sports journalism, Cindy began blogging and tweeting, first as NFL/Redskins editor, and, since August 2010, at The Early Lead.
